channel.title: CVE Feed for Webroot -- SecureAnywhere - Web Shield
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Webroot -- SecureAnywhere - Web Shield

item.title: CVE-2024-7826|2024-10-03T17:46:18.210Z -- webroot -- secureanywhere%20-%20web%20shield
item.description: Improper Check for Unusual or Exceptional Conditions vulnerability in Webroot SecureAnywhere - Web Shield on Windows, ARM, 64 bit, 32 bit (wrURL.Dll modules) allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects SecureAnywhere - Web Shield: before 2.1.2.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-7825|2024-10-03T17:46:06.996Z -- webroot -- secureanywhere%20-%20web%20shield
item.description: Access of Resource Using Incompatible Type ('Type Confusion') vulnerability in Webroot SecureAnywhere - Web Shield on Windows, ARM, 64 bit, 32 bit (wrUrl.Dll modules) allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects SecureAnywhere - Web Shield: before 2.1.2.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-7824|2024-10-03T17:45:56.051Z -- webroot -- secureanywhere%20-%20web%20shield
item.description: Access of Resource Using Incompatible Type ('Type Confusion') vulnerability in Webroot SecureAnywhere - Web Shield on Windows, ARM, 64 bit, 32 bit (wrUrl.Dll modules) allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects SecureAnywhere - Web Shield: before 2.1.2.3.
